item.title: Celebrating a Milestone in the Top 2% of Global Scientists
item.description: I’m really excited to tell you that I’m one of the top 2% of scientists in the world for 2023, according to Stanford University. It’s been ten years of hard work in research and learning, and this award means a lot. üõ§Ô∏è The Journey When I started, it wasn’t easy. There were tough times and I sometimes wondered if I could do it. If you’re researching or studying and it feels tough, keep going.
